text: Start by finding a project that interests you on GitHub, contribute to it. Then apply for GSoC to get some more experience. You can find a list of potential projects in <https://julialang.org/jsoc/projects/>. Ask on <#C67L30Z3L|jsoc> about specific projects that interest you. Once you have a few contributions and you make yourself known, there are a few opportunities available. A few companies welcome interns or part-time remote work arrangements. But you need to strengthen your profile using open source contributions. If the project you are interested in is also deep pocketed, then you can work for the maintainer of the project.
